/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall apartment buildings, their beige and brown facades reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars of various colors are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the city's lively atmosphere.
